en: honor in a song from time to time
He sang until he honored me.

ngiemboon: Ɔ̀ lɔɔn ńne ńgaba mbab, ɔ̀ teŋ gubé.
en: When sharing meat, you have to think about the children.

ngiemboon: Aa jʉʼɔɔn fʉ̀ʼɔɔn páʼɔɔn ńtí míŋ we gẅie à pyě.
en: He is still here like this because of his son who went astray.

ngiemboon: Ńtí kɔ́ ɔ̀ gɔɔn né mèŋ ngie n tè pfɛ́ɛ mekú wɔ́.
en: Why are you telling me I shouldn't eat the bean.

ngiemboon: À zoŋte wɔ́ɔn ńtí nue n cǔa yé.
en: He insults me because I hit him.

ngiemboon: Peg ge gʉa ńtí páʼ mbʉ̀ŋ ne ńkwɔ́ʼɔ.
en: We are going to leave because it threatens to rain.
